A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was an utter disappointment and is arguably the worst movie of the Star Wars franchise.  Yes\, the cinematography is great and there are a few battle scenes that are fun.  However\, as soon as I witnessed the \"prank phone call\" bit at the beginning of the movie\, I knew it was going to be a disaster.  Also\, a shirtless Kylo Ren?  Really?  Apparently Disney is trying to turn Star Wars into a campy-disaster like the Batman movies of the 90's.
